title: BarkMatch
description: BarkMatch is an application that allows people to easily search for dogs in shelters that they would like to take for a walk. It also has an admin side so that shelters can keep their dogs up to date.

title: Search-U
description: Search-U allows users to search for schools by city or the school name itself that they are interested in, while also taking into consideration quality of life in that area.

title: Employee Directory
description: A one stop shop for quick and easy information about your co-workers. Co-workers are dynamically filtered based upon search and can also be sorted.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: This is a weather application that allows users to search for a city they would like. They can save it to a list so that they can check on it when they would like.

title: Note Taker
description: Easily jot down notes and save them in one place. They can be pulled up and deleted after being created.

title: Daily Planner
description: A planner that changes colors depending on if the hour has passed or not. Users can save notes for each hour to plan out their day.
